members.name: Ayushi Mishra
members.description: Takes care of wireframing the web application. Creates all the designs of the whole web application. Works with technologies like Figma, HTML, CSS, Tailwind.

members.name: Amar Narute
members.description: Works on the backend. Takes care of routing and authenticating the pages and other parts of the web application. Works with technologies like Node.js, React.js, Passport Authentication.

members.name: Akash Solienkar
members.description: Constructs the database architecture. Works with MongoDB and MySQL.
